description.0: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.

0.0: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by <cryo>4%</cryo> and Normal ATK SPD by <cryo>1.2%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

1.0: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by <cryo>5%</cryo> and Normal ATK SPD by <cryo>1.5%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

2.0: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by <cryo>6%</cryo> and Normal ATK SPD by <cryo>1.8%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

3.0: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by <cryo>7%</cryo> and Normal ATK SPD by <cryo>2.1%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

4.0: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by <cryo>8%</cryo> and Normal ATK SPD by <cryo>2.4%</cryo> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
